text:
A general view, west from Canal Street, at the Manhattan Bridge Plaza, showing (from right to left) the towers of the Woolworth (233 Broadway, between Barclay Street and Park Place); the Municipal Building (at the intersection of Park Row and Centre Street); and the Singer Building, (Broadway at the N.W. corner of Liberty Street).

October 11, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.
title: General view - Canal Street - West.

text:
(1) Across southerly portion of the Manhattan Bridge Plaza, from Canal Street Station of (the Second Ave., Line).

April 30, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same; a view from the opposite direction.

March 19, 1934.

P. L. Sperr.

Not a dry mount item
